argumentText:
ARGUMENT
t

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | aspval.a | |- A = ( AlgSpan ` W ) |
| 2 |  | aspval.v | |- V = ( Base ` W ) |
| 3 |  | aspval.l | |- L = ( LSubSp ` W ) |
| 4 |  | #P_simp1 | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> W e. AssAlg ) |
| 5 | 2 | #P_subrgss | |- ( S e. ( SubRing ` W ) -> S C_ V ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_3ad2ant2 | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> S C_ V ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 3 | #P_aspval | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S C_ V ) -> ( A ` S ) = |^| { t e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) | S C_ t } ) |
| 8 | 4, 6, 7 | #P_syl2anc | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> ( A ` S ) = |^| { t e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) | S C_ t } ) |
| 9 |  | #P_3simpc | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> ( S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) ) |
| 10 |  | #P_elin | |- ( S e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) <-> ( S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) ) |
| 11 | 9, 10 | #P_sylibr | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> S e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) ) |
| 12 |  | #P_intmin | |- ( S e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) -> |^| { t e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) | S C_ t } = S ) |
| 13 | 11, 12 | #P_syl | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> |^| { t e. ( ( SubRing ` W ) i^i L ) | S C_ t } = S ) |
| 14 | 8, 13 | #P_eqtrd | |- ( ( W e. AssAlg /\ S e. ( SubRing ` W ) /\ S e. L ) -> ( A ` S ) = S ) |
